name: Arcana: Seal of Rimsala
overview: This is a comprehensive improvement-type mod for Arcana, a JRPG dungeon crawler by Hal Labs before they became famous for Kirby and Smash Bros. Please enjoy this modernized take on an underrated title =) • Includes FastROM patch, which speeds up gameplay and reduces lag • Includes Multi-Levelup patch, which lets EXP roll over after gaining a level~ • Undoes 90’s Nintendo censorship (Alchemist selling elixir - Bartender selling beer) • Tells a more coherent story • Makes use of unused animations, dialogue and music • Hundreds of tiny tweaks: items, monster stats, treasure contents, Level Select inventory… and more!
